website_summaries.verdict: If you love the price and ease of use of our Best Bang for the Buck pick, but desire a bit of extra padding, this slightly upgraded version is a great alternative.
pros: Comes with a well padded full body pillow for superior support
Side impact tested for multi-angle safety
Padding is removable and washing machine and dryer safe
Two crotch buckle positions accommodate growth
Auto belt guides accommodate use without a base

customer_reviews.title: Spend little more money for a better option
customer_reviews.text: This car seat should’ve been a little more cheaper than what I paid for it. It’s very difficult to take in and out the car. To me it’s not as safe as I would want for my infant. It shifts back & forth while riding, but with the seat belt latch it will secure it more but it makes the car seat difficult to snap down. If you can spend a little more money for a better car seat.There is no price over the safety of our little one’s
customer_reviews.author: ShonAlex

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great carseat and very cute . A great option for those that dont want the typical girl pink . Careseat and base fit perfect and in my 2015 Honda Accord . Had it checked for safety before our granddaughter is born . I took the seat off and on the base several time and it went on with ease and never faltered. For an inexpensive carseat im very happy with this seat .
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s works and looks comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s works and looks comfortable for baby, the sun shade is basically useless as it doesn’t cover enough, the carseat sometimes catches on the base so I have to put it back in and try again to get my baby out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust straps.
customer_reviews.text: It's quite difficult to adjust the straps. It seems like it was poorly designed. The handle to release it from the base is tucked under and isn't the easiest to grab. I fumble around to find it most times. My daughter loves sleeping in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Dennert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap seat. Hard to adjust but does the job ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap seat. Hard to adjust but does the job. Is as safe as other more expensive. They are just easier to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good car seat for the money. I bought one for my new granddaughter. It meets the safety requirements and is a standard car seat.
customer_reviews.author: JStew65

customer_reviews.title: infant carrier/carseat
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping- easy to follow instructions for assembly - value for the price- item as described
customer_reviews.author: Shirlee Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my granddaughter. The colors look much better in person. It is very lightweight and simple to use. The baby was 7lbs when we brought her home in this seat and she was snug and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Traycee313

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this. It’s not safe.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible. It is not safe at all and is so tiny my 4 month old barely fits in it. I wish I could return it. I had to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE DO NOT BUY IT THIS CARSEAT STRESSES ME OUT EVERYTIME I COME IN CONTACT WITH IT!!! The cover shade is way to small and falls all the way under the car seat or all the way over it!! It does not stay put!!! I wish I could get a full refund on this it’s a horrible product!!!! I would’ve given it no stars but I had to select one
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome car seat for a newborn. Love how the straps work and the base is great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Chernoff

customer_reviews.title: Lavender BLAH! lol
customer_reviews.text: Not the color I wanted, and yes this is a lavender carseat, but its super light weight which is important and easy to use. 5 stars, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not even used 2 weeks and the rubber started coming off the bottom! Falling apart from a preemie!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mason

customer_reviews.title: but not recommended for long car rides or out all day things
customer_reviews.text: No comfort foam at all...it functions for what its for, but not recommended for long car rides or out all day things...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Too small. My baby outgrew it so fast. I never knew how to put the cover thing on it. Not worth the money I spent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just fit my babygirl. Convient and easy use in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Canopy too short
customer_reviews.text: Canopy is too short to block the sun. Everything else is ok
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem the sturdiest.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for what we needed it for but I didn’t feel like it would actually protect our baby in a crash.
customer_reviews.author: kori

customer_reviews.title: Good for a infant but the mom did not like ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for a infant but the mom did not like the color (because it is a boy she is having). Price was spot on .
customer_reviews.author: Jehu Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: it is dangerous because the top part falls easily and is very small
customer_reviews.text: It's not a good chair for babies, I really do not recommend it :(
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really struggled in car rides but this car seat made the car rides so much more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Aneshia Starks

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We love it, our baby loves it and the price is right. The only complaint I have is that the sun shade/bonnet is not big enough. It only covers about 25% which isn't enough, the sun seems to get in baby's eyes a lot. If it would cover 50% then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered! Super light weight, and even had infant pillow included! Loved the colors as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Whitnie

product_meta.title: Evenflo Nurture DLX Infant Car Seat, Kiri
product_meta.description: Specifically for infants--convenience for you and comfort for baby. Cradling your baby from the very first ride home. The Evenflo Nurture Infant Car Seat provides your newest family member the superior safety that Evenflo is known for. An ergonomically shaped handle creates a more comfortable carry and a pivoting canopy provides shade for your baby. The Nurture can be used rear-facing only for children weighing 5 - 22 lbs. This seat can be used with or without the base, and additional accessory bases are available. DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat. Periodically inspect and clean the restraint's crotch buckle of food, liquids, and other debris to ensure proper latching. Place the buckle in a cup of warm water and gently agitate the buckle back and forth. Press the red button several times while the buckle is in the water. Do not submerge the harness strap. To avoid damage to the buckle, do not clean the buckle with soap or detergents and do not use a lubricant.
feature_bullets: 5-point harness for safety plus 3 shoulder harness positions and 2 crotch buckle positions for better fit and longer use
Separate stay-in-car base allows for easy transfer from home to car; also available separately
Auto belt guides for use without a base. Fit - Top of child’s head is at least 1 Inch below the top of the child restraint seat back
Energy absorbing foam liner provides added safety & comfort
Easy-off, machine-washable car seat pad for quick cleanings

specifications.Care instructions: DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.
